channel.description: Recent content in oauth2 on Ye Zheng's Blog

item.title: Django oauth2 provider
item.description: Django oauth2 provider $ pip install django-oauth2-provider # settings.py INSTALLED_APPS = ( # ... 'provider', 'provider.oauth2', ) # urls.py url(r'^oauth2/', include('provider.oauth2.urls', namespace = 'oauth2')), $ python manage.py syncdb $ python manage.py migrate How to request an access token for the first time ? Create a client entry in your database To find out which type of client you need to create, read Section 2.1. To create a new entry simply use the Django admin panel.
